activities.name: Live Science Shows
activities.description: Mind-blowing live demonstrations with interactive experiments that captivate and educate! Watch as dry ice, colorful chemical reactions, and exciting physical experiments come to life right before your eyes.
activities.safetyNote: All experiments use non-toxic, child-safe materials. Trained professionals supervise all activities.

activities.name: Hands-On Experiments
activities.description: Children become scientists! Each child participates in conducting their own experiments and creating cool projects they can take home.
activities.safetyNote: All materials are food-grade safe. Parental supervision encouraged for younger children.

activities.name: STEM Workshops
activities.description: Structured learning programs combining Science, Technology, Engineering & Mathematics. Build robots, code simple programs, and solve real-world problems.
activities.safetyNote: Hands-on guidance provided by experienced STEM instructors.

activities.name: School Science Events
activities.description: Customized science day experiences for entire schools. Assembly shows, classroom workshops, and science fair support all included.
activities.safetyNote: School safety protocols followed. All materials certified safe for children.
activities.ideal: Schools, annual day celebrations, educational events

activities.name: Birthday Science Parties
activities.description: Make birthday parties unforgettable with science! Combine entertainment, education, and hands-on fun. Perfect for kids who love to learn and play.
activities.safetyNote: Trained professionals ensure safe, fun experience. All materials are non-toxic.

activities.name: Science Camps
activities.description: Week-long or multi-day intensive science learning experiences. Perfect for summer vacations or school breaks with daily new experiments and activities.
activities.duration: Full day (8 hours) or Half day (4 hours)
activities.safetyNote: Comprehensive supervision with trained staff. First aid certified team.
